Bobop is now Responsive!
16 Feb 2012

This website is now responsive to different screen sizes using the Responsive Design technique.

I used Twitter's Bootstrap tool to create the layout and design of this site a few months age. Since then, Bootstrap has upgraded to version 2.0 which includes Responsive Design features.
